channel.title: Comments on: Panettone – Daring Bakers Challenge December 2012

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud

item.description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year Anita :) I def wouldn't complain about the chocolate sub ;)

item.title: By: Jeanne

item.description: Looks gorgeous! I wish I had a slice with my morning tea.
item.content:encoded: Looks gorgeous! I wish I had a slice with my morning tea.

item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: Your Panettone looks delicious and I love the choc chips! I tried to make a gluten free one and it wasn't that successful. Looked pretty though. Hope you had a lovely Christmas
item.content:encoded: Your Panettone looks delicious and I love the choc chips! I tried to make a gluten free one and it wasn’t that successful. Looked pretty though. Hope you had a lovely Christmas

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Wonderful job, your panettone looks great!
